content: tiny top hat for dolls 3 5mm hook - any yarn will work i used worsted weight worked in the round - top down 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 blo single_crochet around 18 5-10 single_crochet around 6r of 18 11 flo increase single_crochet 2 around 24 12 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 slip_stitch into next fo weave in end to make hat larger use a bigger hook hat isn t meant to be stuffed but can be if needed
